channel.title: Goodbye!
channel.description:
[center][size=13pt]This isn't for attention![/size]
Hi, It's me a fellow member of the moparscape forum. I'd just like to say it's been great learning from the moparscape forum and working with others. I've been put through alot the past two weeks. [b]Yesterday my auti died in her sleep at around 9 o'clock[/b]. [b]The week before that we was informed that my grandma died of cancer during her stay in hospital[/b]. I'd like to thankyou all for reading.
Farewell and goodluck.
-[b]Slivion[/b][/center]

item.title: Goodbye!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Issues surrounding sorry can never be over analysed. In depth analysis of sorry can be an enriching experience. Cited by many as the single most important influence on post modern micro eco compartmentalism, sorry is featuring more and more in the ideals of the young and upwardly mobile. Crossing many cultural barriers it still draws remarks such as ‘I wouldn’t touch it with a barge pole’ and ‘i’d rather eat wasps’ from the easily lead, who just don’t like that sort of thing. Though I would rather be in bed I will now examine the primary causes of sorry.

Social Factors

Society is a human product. The immortal and indispensable phrase ?honesty is the best policy? [1], contrary to my learned colleague Sir George Allen?s recent publication ?Into the eye of , could not have been referring to eighteenth century beliefs regarding society. A society without sorry is like a society without knowledge, in that it is crunchy on the outside but soft in the middle.

Of paramount importance to any study of sorry within its context, is understanding the ideals of society. If society has a favourite child, it is sorry.

Economic Factors

Derived from ‘oikonomikos,’ which means skilled in household management, the word economics is synonymous with sorry. Of course, sorry fits perfectly into the Spanish-Armada model of economics. Oil
Prices

sorry

Indisputably there is a link. How can this be explained? Even a child could work out that oil prices plays in increasingly important role in the market economy. Strong fluctuations in investor confidence have been seen over the past two financial years.

Political Factors

Modern politics owes much to the animal kingdom. Comparing the general view of politics held by the poor of the west with those of the east can be like comparing chalk and cheese.

In the words of a legend in their own life time, Vatusia Woodpecker ‘I don’t believe in ghosts, but I do believe in democracy.’ [2] Amazingly, he new nothing of sorry until he was well into his thirties. History tells us that sorry will always be a vote winner, whether we like it, or not.

One thing’s certain. The Human species liberally desires sorry, and what’s more human than politics?
Conclusion

We can conclude that the sorry is, to use the language of the streets ‘Super Cool.’ It brings peace, ‘literally’ plants seeds for harvest, and never hides.

I will leave the last word to the famous Mariah Clooney: ‘I demand sorry, nothing more nothing less.’ [3]

Read full topic
